description: Cenon comes with several example projects, which are located in the Projects folder in the Cenon installation directory. Cenon projects are also known as "Jobs" when used by Cenon CAM. Examples of CAM jobs are located in the Jobs folder.

In Cenon, the ".cenon" extension is used for projects, whereas the ".cenon~" extension is used for backup files. If you need to copy a Cenon project to a DOS disk change the ".cenon" extension to ".cen".
